p: As the 2019‐nCoV epidemic progresses, we will learn more about the propensity of this agent to engage both innate immune and hemostatic systems, two critical emergency response pathways that maintain homeostasis under controlled circumstances, but that produce severe pathologies of their own when present under dysregulated conditions. The observations of Tang and colleagues provide early evidence that enhanced vigilance is required to identify the emergence of DIC in 2019‐nCoV pneumonia patients.
